title: [HEVC] BREAKING BAD - COMPLETE SERIES 8.5GB
description:
Breaking Bad - The Complete Series


I encoded the entire series from Blu-ray rips


I used HEVC for the Video and HEAAC for the Audio


Resolution is at 720x400, but it is virtually flawless


All chapters and subs (English) are included in the MKV files themselves.


It was made to be burned to a 8.5GB Dual-layer DVD for easy back up




Thumbnail Album - http://imgur.com/a/SO0EP#0


If the thumbnail link doesn't work, I've included all of them in the torrent itself, so you can download them first, if you choose, to confirm the quality of the encode.
